legacy.full_text: Explaining my prediction that children being difficult to raise, and even fertility crises, will be common in sapient species across the universe. https://t.co/dIsgjejZKV

@atroyn Ozempic is why there's a fertility crisis. Too much optionality, too much opportunity cost. Parenthood is glam when your alternative is peasanthood; now, we have things too good (and, as status-seekers, we're vulnerable to antinatalist monocultural drift). https://t.co/WrvnOmnZRv
